body_types.description: A four-door passenger car with a separate trunk for cargo.
A compact car with a rear door that opens upwards, providing access to the cargo area.
Sport Utility Vehicle, characterized by a higher ground clearance and often suitable for off-road driving.
A two-door car with a fixed roof and a sloping rear roofline, usually more sporty in design.
A car with a retractable or removable roof, allowing it to be used with the top open or closed.
A spacious passenger vehicle with sliding doors and often with three rows of seating.
A vehicle with an open cargo area at the back, suitable for transporting goods and often used for off-road purposes.
A vehicle that combines features of both SUVs and passenger cars, often built on a car platform.
